metadata.title: ShipFire - Build Your SaaS Website in 3 Minutes
metadata.description: A free website builder designed for global indie developers. Launch your product in 48 hours with zero code and built-in AI optimization tools. ShipFire helps your product reach users worldwide instantly.
metadata.keywords: ShipFire, SaaS website builder, website builder, indie developer tools, no-code website builder, AI website builder, global website builder, free website builder

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: News, resources, and updates about ShipFire

tools_notice.text: Looking for hands-on tools? Beyond these tutorials, explore our complete suite of website building tools on our
tools_notice.suffix: for immediate website creation and advanced features.

my_invites.title: My Invites
my_invites.invite_tip: Invite 1 friend to use ShipFire, reward $50.
my_invites.no_orders: You can't invite others before you purchased ShipFire
my_invites.no_affiliates: You're not allowed to invite others, please contact us to apply for permission.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear what went well or how we can improve the ShipFire experience.
feedback.rating_tip: How do you feel about ShipFire?

share.title: Share this website
share.text: Just created this website for FREE using ShipFire! Try it yourself:
